sentences: Kas sa oled terve ja tervine?
context: The Estonian word 'tervist' is an interjection used as a farewell greeting, similar to saying 'goodbye' or 'cheers'. It's derived from the word 'tervis' (health) and literally means 'to your health'. It can also be used when someone sneezes, similar to how English speakers say 'bless you'. The word expresses well-wishes for good health.
